attributes.action: Stop using 'life' when sentencing in court, unless it means life in Prison
attributes.additional_details:
We all hear 'life' when sentences care given out in court, however in this country this does not mean a life behind bars!! Our Justice System is misleading the public and I  believe it is time this changed. Please sign this petition and make a small difference to all those victims who are having to live with this mis justice. The courts should not being using the word 'life' when sentencing unless its a true life sentence.

Sign this e-petition and make a difference.
Thank you.
